questions.question: What is your experience with React?
questions.answer: I have extensive experience with React, including hooks, context API, and performance optimization.

questions.question: Have you worked with TypeScript?
questions.answer: Yes, I am proficient in TypeScript and have used it in several projects to improve code quality and maintainability.

questions.question: What CSS frameworks are you familiar with?
questions.answer: I am familiar with Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, and Material-UI.

questions.question: What about state management libraries?
questions.answer: I have experience with Redux and Zustand for state management in large-scale applications.

questions.question: What is your experience with Node.js?
questions.answer: I have experience building RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express.

questions.question: Have you worked with any databases?
questions.answer: Yes, I have experience with both SQL (PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB) databases.
